tool_description: Tennis data for top competitions around the world including tournaments, matches, results, and rankings.
name: Tennis Live Data
title: Tennis Live Data

api_list.name: Matches By Date
api_list.description: Lists matches in all tours, and tournaments,  for a given date. If no date is supplied, returns matches today.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/matches-by-date/2020-09-06"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/matches-by-date/{date}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Players
api_list.description: Full Listing of Players by Tour

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Matches By Tournament By Player
api_list.description: Retrieves matches and results for a given `player_id `within a given `tournament_id`
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/matches-results-by-player/1343/98262"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/matches-results-by-player/{tourn_id}/{player_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Tournaments
api_list.description: Lists a schedule of all tournaments for a given `tour_code` and `season_id`
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/tournaments/ATP/2020"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/tournaments/{tour_code}/{season_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Tournament Matches
api_list.description: Lists matches for a given `tournament_id`. This endpoint is a brief summary of all matches within a tournament without result details or detailed player information - use for quick summary of a given tournament.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/matches/1143"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/matches/{tournament_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Tournament Matches By Date
api_list.description: Lists all matches for a given `tournament_id` on a given `date`. This is a quick summary view of matches on the given date without result or detailed player info.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/matches/1143/2020-01-06"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/matches/{tournament_id}/{date}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Tournament Matches and Results
api_list.description: Lists matches for a given `tournament_id` in detail with match results and detailed player info. This can return a very large file. If speed is required we suggest using /matches-results/{tournament_id}/{date} or the /matches/{tournament_id} endpoint and querying match results individually on the /match/{match_id} endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/matches-results/1193"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/matches-results/{tournament_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Tournament Matches and Results by Date
api_list.description: This endpoint is the same as the /matches-results/{tournament_id} endpoint but can be narrowed down by date for faster loading.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/matches-results/1193/2020-08-22"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/matches-results/{tournament_id}/{date}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennis-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Tour Rankings
api_list.description: Lists the top 100 players in the relevant tour ranking with their position, movement, and ranking points.

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

print(response.json())
